
            <h1 class="postTitle">
                <a id="cb_post_title_url" class="postTitle2 vertical-middle" href="https://www.cnblogs.com/xiaoyan2017/p/19054951" title="发布于 2025-08-23 23:21">
    <span role="heading" aria-level="2">uniapp-vue3-os手机oa系统|uni-app+vue3跨三端os后台管理模板</span>
    

</a>

            </h1>
            <div class="clear"></div>
            <div class="postBody">
                <div id="cnblogs_post_body" class="blogpost-body blogpost-body-html">
<p><span style="font-size: 18px; font-family: 宋体, &quot;Songti SC&quot;; color: rgba(128, 0, 128, 1)">最新研发<span style="background-color: rgba(204, 255, 255, 1)">uniapp+vue3+pinia2+uv-ui</span>仿ios手机界面<strong>oa</strong>后台系统解决方案。</span></p>
<p><span style="font-size: 12px"><strong>uni-vue3-oa</strong>基于<span style="background-color: rgba(255, 255, 153, 1)">uniapp+vue3+pinia2+qiun-data-charts</span>从0-1纯手撸<strong>仿ios界面</strong>OA式手机后台。实现<span style="background-color: rgba(204, 255, 204, 1)">栅格化磁贴布局、多屏滑动、自定义桌面小组件、桌面图标支持链接/页面地址</span>方式打开。支持运行到<strong>h5+小程序+app端</strong>。</span></p>
<h3>运行效果</h3>
<p><span style="font-size: 12px">编译到<strong>h5+小程序+app端</strong>效果。</span></p>
<p><img alt="未标题-3" loading="lazy" data-src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1289798/202508/1289798-20250823214646575-946524411.png" class="lazyload"></p>
<p><span style="font-size: 12px">自定义手机<strong>os式栅格磁贴</strong>布局模板。</span></p>
<p><img alt="未标题-2" loading="lazy" data-src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1289798/202508/1289798-20250823214849164-1242023268.png" class="lazyload"></p>
<h3>技术栈</h3>
<ul>
<li><span style="font-size: 12px">编辑器：HbuilderX 4.75</span></li>
<li><span style="font-size: 12px">技术框架：uniapp+vue3+vite5+pinia2</span></li>
<li><span style="font-size: 12px">UI组件库：uni-ui+uv-ui（uniapp vue3组件库）</span></li>
<li><span style="font-size: 12px">弹框组件：uv3-popup（基于uniapp+vue3自定义弹窗组件）</span></li>
<li><span style="font-size: 12px">表格组件：uv3-table（基于uniapp+vue3跨端综合表格组件）</span></li>
<li><span style="font-size: 12px">图表组件：qiun-data-charts</span></li>
<li><span style="font-size: 12px">模拟数据：mockjs（用于自定义表格模拟数据）</span></li>
<li><span style="font-size: 12px">缓存技术：pinia-plugin-unistorage</span></li>
<li><span style="font-size: 12px">编译支持：h5+小程序+app端</span></li>
</ul>
<p><img alt="未标题-6" loading="lazy" data-src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1289798/202508/1289798-20250823215318026-1670465976.png" class="lazyload"></p>
<p><img alt="p1" loading="lazy" data-src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1289798/202508/1289798-20250823215507919-871091697.gif" class="lazyload"></p>
<p><span style="font-size: 12px">支持更换桌面壁纸、桌面二级缩略弹窗菜单。</span></p>
<p><img alt="p3" loading="lazy" data-src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1289798/202508/1289798-20250823215725500-355935647.gif" class="lazyload"></p>
<p><span style="font-size: 12px">项目整体采用<strong>背景虚化模糊</strong>视觉UI。实现了<span style="background-color: rgba(204, 255, 255, 1)">图表、表格、表单、编辑器、用户管理、角色管理</span>等常用业务场景示例。探索一种全新的os式手机oa管理系统新解决方案。</span></p>
<p><img alt="p5" loading="lazy" data-src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1289798/202508/1289798-20250823220423718-741444484.gif" class="lazyload"></p>
<h3>项目框架目录</h3>
<p><span style="font-size: 12px">使用<strong>hbuilderx4.75</strong>编辑器搭建项目模板，采用<strong>vue3 setup</strong>语法糖编码开发。</span></p>
<p><img alt="360截图20250823064942397" loading="lazy" data-src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1289798/202508/1289798-20250823220622665-1193891078.png" class="lazyload"></p>
<blockquote>
<h3><em>uni-vue3-os手机oa管理系统已经更新到我的原创作品集，多谢支持！</em></h3>
<p><span style="font-size: 12px"><a href="https://mall.bilibili.com/neul-next/detailuniversal/detail.html?isMerchant=1&amp;page=detailuniversal_detail&amp;saleType=10&amp;itemsId=11190495&amp;loadingShow=1&amp;noTitleBar=1&amp;msource=merchant_share" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow">uni-app+vue3+pinia2跨端仿ios桌面OA管理系统</a></span></p>
</blockquote>
<p><img alt="p6" loading="lazy" data-src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1289798/202508/1289798-20250823221018351-22610404.gif" class="lazyload"></p>
<p><span style="font-size: 12px">支持运行到web端在pc界面以<strong>750px</strong>宽度显示布局。</span></p>
<p><img alt="001360截图20250823105240868" loading="lazy" data-src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1289798/202508/1289798-20250823221127465-1543578138.png" class="lazyload"></p>
<p><img alt="001360截图20250823105411428" loading="lazy" data-src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1289798/202508/1289798-20250823221145002-481704174.png" class="lazyload"></p>
<p><img alt="001360截图20250823105656207" loading="lazy" data-src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1289798/202508/1289798-20250823221158650-2139079780.png" class="lazyload"></p>
<p><img alt="p1" loading="lazy" data-src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1289798/202508/1289798-20250823221301298-1732015970.gif" class="lazyload"></p>
<h3>通用布局模板</h3>
<p><img alt="image" loading="lazy" data-src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1289798/202508/1289798-20250823221447152-1500011001.png" class="lazyload"></p>
<p><span style="font-size: 12px">页面整体布局分为<strong>自定义顶部+桌面内容+底部</strong>三部分。</span></p>
<div class="cnblogs_code">
<pre><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&lt;</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">script </span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)">setup</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&gt;</span><span style="background-color: rgba(245, 245, 245, 1); color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">
    import { ref } from </span><span style="background-color: rgba(245, 245, 245, 1); color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="background-color: rgba(245, 245, 245, 1); color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">vue</span><span style="background-color: rgba(245, 245, 245, 1); color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="background-color: rgba(245, 245, 245, 1); color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">
    import { appStore } from </span><span style="background-color: rgba(245, 245, 245, 1); color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="background-color: rgba(245, 245, 245, 1); color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">@/pinia/modules/app</span><span style="background-color: rgba(245, 245, 245, 1); color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="background-color: rgba(245, 245, 245, 1); color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">
    
    const appState </span><span style="background-color: rgba(245, 245, 245, 1); color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">=</span><span style="background-color: rgba(245, 245, 245, 1); color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)"> appStore()
    
    </span><span style="background-color: rgba(245, 245, 245, 1); color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">//</span><span style="background-color: rgba(245, 245, 245, 1); color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)"> #ifdef MP-WEIXIN</span>
<span style="background-color: rgba(245, 245, 245, 1); color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">    defineOptions({
        options: { virtualHost: </span><span style="background-color: rgba(245, 245, 245, 1); color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">true</span><span style="background-color: rgba(245, 245, 245, 1); color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)"> }
    })
    </span><span style="background-color: rgba(245, 245, 245, 1); color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">//</span><span style="background-color: rgba(245, 245, 245, 1); color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)"> #endif</span>
<span style="background-color: rgba(245, 245, 245, 1); color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">    
    const props </span><span style="background-color: rgba(245, 245, 245, 1); color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">=</span><span style="background-color: rgba(245, 245, 245, 1); color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)"> defineProps({
        </span><span style="background-color: rgba(245, 245, 245, 1); color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">//</span><span style="background-color: rgba(245, 245, 245, 1); color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)"> 是否显示背景图</span>
<span style="background-color: rgba(245, 245, 245, 1); color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">        showBackground: { type: [Boolean, String], </span><span style="background-color: rgba(245, 245, 245, 1); color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">default</span><span style="background-color: rgba(245, 245, 245, 1); color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">: </span><span style="background-color: rgba(245, 245, 245, 1); color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">true</span><span style="background-color: rgba(245, 245, 245, 1); color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)"> },
    })
    
    </span><span style="background-color: rgba(245, 245, 245, 1); color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">//</span><span style="background-color: rgba(245, 245, 245, 1); color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)"> 自定义变量(桌面图标)</span>
<span style="background-color: rgba(245, 245, 245, 1); color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">    const deskVariable </span><span style="background-color: rgba(245, 245, 245, 1); color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">=</span><span style="background-color: rgba(245, 245, 245, 1); color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)"> ref({
        </span><span style="background-color: rgba(245, 245, 245, 1); color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="background-color: rgba(245, 245, 245, 1); color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">--icon-radius</span><span style="background-color: rgba(245, 245, 245, 1); color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="background-color: rgba(245, 245, 245, 1); color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">: </span><span style="background-color: rgba(245, 245, 245, 1); color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="background-color: rgba(245, 245, 245, 1); color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">10px</span><span style="background-color: rgba(245, 245, 245, 1); color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="background-color: rgba(245, 245, 245, 1); color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">, </span><span style="background-color: rgba(245, 245, 245, 1); color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">//</span><span style="background-color: rgba(245, 245, 245, 1); color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)"> 圆角</span>
        <span style="background-color: rgba(245, 245, 245, 1); color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="background-color: rgba(245, 245, 245, 1); color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">--icon-size</span><span style="background-color: rgba(245, 245, 245, 1); color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="background-color: rgba(245, 245, 245, 1); color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">: </span><span style="background-color: rgba(245, 245, 245, 1); color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="background-color: rgba(245, 245, 245, 1); color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">120rpx</span><span style="background-color: rgba(245, 245, 245, 1); color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="background-color: rgba(245, 245, 245, 1); color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">, </span><span style="background-color: rgba(245, 245, 245, 1); color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">//</span><span style="background-color: rgba(245, 245, 245, 1); color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)"> 图标尺寸(设置rpx自定义手机设备)</span>
        <span style="background-color: rgba(245, 245, 245, 1); color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="background-color: rgba(245, 245, 245, 1); color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">--icon-gap-col</span><span style="background-color: rgba(245, 245, 245, 1); color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="background-color: rgba(245, 245, 245, 1); color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">: </span><span style="background-color: rgba(245, 245, 245, 1); color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="background-color: rgba(245, 245, 245, 1); color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">25px</span><span style="background-color: rgba(245, 245, 245, 1); color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="background-color: rgba(245, 245, 245, 1); color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">, </span><span style="background-color: rgba(245, 245, 245, 1); color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">//</span><span style="background-color: rgba(245, 245, 245, 1); color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)"> 水平间距</span>
        <span style="background-color: rgba(245, 245, 245, 1); color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="background-color: rgba(245, 245, 245, 1); color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">--icon-gap-row</span><span style="background-color: rgba(245, 245, 245, 1); color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="background-color: rgba(245, 245, 245, 1); color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">: </span><span style="background-color: rgba(245, 245, 245, 1); color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="background-color: rgba(245, 245, 245, 1); color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">45px</span><span style="background-color: rgba(245, 245, 245, 1); color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="background-color: rgba(245, 245, 245, 1); color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">, </span><span style="background-color: rgba(245, 245, 245, 1); color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">//</span><span style="background-color: rgba(245, 245, 245, 1); color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)"> 垂直间距</span>
        <span style="background-color: rgba(245, 245, 245, 1); color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="background-color: rgba(245, 245, 245, 1); color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">--icon-labelSize</span><span style="background-color: rgba(245, 245, 245, 1); color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="background-color: rgba(245, 245, 245, 1); color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">: </span><span style="background-color: rgba(245, 245, 245, 1); color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="background-color: rgba(245, 245, 245, 1); color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">12px</span><span style="background-color: rgba(245, 245, 245, 1); color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="background-color: rgba(245, 245, 245, 1); color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">, </span><span style="background-color: rgba(245, 245, 245, 1); color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">//</span><span style="background-color: rgba(245, 245, 245, 1); color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)"> 标签文字大小</span>
        <span style="background-color: rgba(245, 245, 245, 1); color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="background-color: rgba(245, 245, 245, 1); color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">--icon-labelColor</span><span style="background-color: rgba(245, 245, 245, 1); color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="background-color: rgba(245, 245, 245, 1); color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">: </span><span style="background-color: rgba(245, 245, 245, 1); color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="background-color: rgba(245, 245, 245, 1); color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">#fff</span><span style="background-color: rgba(245, 245, 245, 1); color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="background-color: rgba(245, 245, 245, 1); color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">, </span><span style="background-color: rgba(245, 245, 245, 1); color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">//</span><span style="background-color: rgba(245, 245, 245, 1); color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)"> 标签颜色</span>
        <span style="background-color: rgba(245, 245, 245, 1); color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="background-color: rgba(245, 245, 245, 1); color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">--icon-fit</span><span style="background-color: rgba(245, 245, 245, 1); color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="background-color: rgba(245, 245, 245, 1); color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">: </span><span style="background-color: rgba(245, 245, 245, 1); color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="background-color: rgba(245, 245, 245, 1); color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">contain</span><span style="background-color: rgba(245, 245, 245, 1); color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="background-color: rgba(245, 245, 245, 1); color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">, </span><span style="background-color: rgba(245, 245, 245, 1); color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">//</span><span style="background-color: rgba(245, 245, 245, 1); color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)"> 图标自适应模式</span>
<span style="background-color: rgba(245, 245, 245, 1); color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">    })
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&lt;/</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">script</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&gt;</span>

<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&lt;</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">template</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&gt;</span>
    <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&lt;</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">view </span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)">class</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="uv3__container flexbox flex-col flex1"</span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)"> :style</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="deskVariable"</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&gt;</span>
        <span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">&lt;!--</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)"> 顶部插槽 </span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">--&gt;</span>
        <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&lt;</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">slot </span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)">name</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="header"</span> <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">/&gt;</span>
        
        <span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">&lt;!--</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)"> 内容区 </span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">--&gt;</span>
        <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&lt;</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">view </span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)">class</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="uv3__scrollview flex1"</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&gt;</span>
            <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&lt;</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">slot </span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">/&gt;</span>
        <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&lt;/</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">view</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&gt;</span>
        
        <span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">&lt;!--</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)"> 底部插槽 </span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">--&gt;</span>
        <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&lt;</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">slot </span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)">name</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="footer"</span> <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">/&gt;</span>
        
        <span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">&lt;!--</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)"> 背景图(修复小程序不支持background背景图) </span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">--&gt;</span>
        <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&lt;</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">image </span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)">v-if</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="showBackground"</span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)"> class</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="fixwxbg"</span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)"> :src</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="appState.config.skin || '/static/skin/theme.png'"</span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)"> mode</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="scaleToFill"</span> <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">/&gt;</span>
    <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&lt;/</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">view</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&gt;</span>
<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&lt;/</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">template</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&gt;</span></pre>
</div>
<h3>uniapp+vue3自定义table表格</h3>
<p><span style="font-size: 12px">uniapp-vue3-oa管理系统用到的table表格组件uv3table。全新升级版跨三端【<span style="background-color: rgba(255, 255, 153, 1)">h5+小程序+app端</span>】多功能<strong>增强版table</strong>组件。</span></p>
<p><img alt="p6-2" loading="lazy" data-src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1289798/202508/1289798-20250823222019088-822315098.gif" class="lazyload"></p>
<p><span style="font-size: 12px">想要了解更多关于自定义表格详情，可以去看看下面这篇分享文章。</span></p>
<p><span style="font-size: 12px"><a class="postTitle2 vertical-middle" href="https://www.cnblogs.com/xiaoyan2017/p/19043040" target="_blank">uniapp-vue3-table：基于uni-app+vue3跨端自定义表格table组件</a></span></p>
<p><img alt="未标题-7" loading="lazy" data-src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1289798/202508/1289798-20250823222241536-1309676913.png" class="lazyload"></p>
<p><img alt="001360截图20250822223844744" loading="lazy" data-src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1289798/202508/1289798-20250823222348578-1533272489.png" class="lazyload"></p>

<p><img alt="009360截图20250822232839699" loading="lazy" data-src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1289798/202508/1289798-20250823222827249-1006126843.png" class="lazyload"></p>

<p><img alt="010360截图20250822233002531" loading="lazy" data-src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1289798/202508/1289798-20250823222904023-1418287557.png" class="lazyload"></p>

<p><img alt="014360截图20250823003200599" loading="lazy" data-src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1289798/202508/1289798-20250823222951235-628034806.png" class="lazyload"></p>
<p><img alt="014360截图20250823003250542" loading="lazy" data-src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1289798/202508/1289798-20250823223002498-289295348.png" class="lazyload"></p>
<p><img alt="015360截图20250823003332126" loading="lazy" data-src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1289798/202508/1289798-20250823223017706-654226388.png" class="lazyload"></p>
<p><img alt="016360截图20250823003526504" loading="lazy" data-src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1289798/202508/1289798-20250823223031249-1124941340.png" class="lazyload"></p>
<p><img alt="017360截图20250823003554977" loading="lazy" data-src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1289798/202508/1289798-20250823223052177-1447740005.png" class="lazyload"></p>
<p><img alt="016360截图20250822234353341" loading="lazy" data-src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1289798/202508/1289798-20250823223115277-1621012564.png" class="lazyload"></p>
<p><span style="font-size: 12px">看到这里感觉还不错吧，爆肝好几个日夜纯手撸os式手机oa后台管理解决方案。</span></p>
<h3>桌面布局结构</h3>
<p><img alt="image" loading="lazy" data-src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1289798/202508/1289798-20250823223434431-352952071.png" class="lazyload"></p>
<div class="cnblogs_code">
<pre><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&lt;</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">script </span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)">setup</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&gt;</span><span style="background-color: rgba(245, 245, 245, 1); color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">
    import { ref } from </span><span style="background-color: rgba(245, 245, 245, 1); color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="background-color: rgba(245, 245, 245, 1); color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">vue</span><span style="background-color: rgba(245, 245, 245, 1); color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="background-color: rgba(245, 245, 245, 1); color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">
    
    import Desk from </span><span style="background-color: rgba(245, 245, 245, 1); color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="background-color: rgba(245, 245, 245, 1); color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">./components/desk.vue</span><span style="background-color: rgba(245, 245, 245, 1); color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="background-color: rgba(245, 245, 245, 1); color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">
    import Dock from </span><span style="background-color: rgba(245, 245, 245, 1); color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="background-color: rgba(245, 245, 245, 1); color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">./components/dock.vue</span><span style="background-color: rgba(245, 245, 245, 1); color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="background-color: rgba(245, 245, 245, 1); color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">
    import Touch from </span><span style="background-color: rgba(245, 245, 245, 1); color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="background-color: rgba(245, 245, 245, 1); color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">./components/touch.vue</span><span style="background-color: rgba(245, 245, 245, 1); color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">'</span>
<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&lt;/</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">script</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&gt;</span>

<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&lt;</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">template</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&gt;</span>
    <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&lt;</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">uv3-layout</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&gt;</span>
        <span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">&lt;!--</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)"> 桌面菜单 </span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">--&gt;</span>
        <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&lt;</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">Desk </span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">/&gt;</span>
        
        <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&lt;</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">template </span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)">#footer</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&gt;</span>
            <span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">&lt;!--</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)"> 底部导航 </span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">--&gt;</span>
            <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&lt;</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">Dock </span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">/&gt;</span>
        <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&lt;/</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">template</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&gt;</span>
        <span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">&lt;!--</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)"> 悬浮球(辅助触控) </span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">--&gt;</span>
        <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&lt;</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">Touch </span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">/&gt;</span>
    <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&lt;/</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">uv3-layout</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&gt;</span>
<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&lt;/</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">template</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&gt;</span></pre>
</div>
<h3>uniapp+vue3手机桌面os栅格化布局</h3>
<p><img alt="image" loading="lazy" data-src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1289798/202508/1289798-20250823224021281-1242799848.png" class="lazyload"></p>
<p><img alt="image" loading="lazy" data-src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1289798/202508/1289798-20250823224234932-130524612.png" class="lazyload"></p>
<p><img alt="image" loading="lazy" data-src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1289798/202508/1289798-20250823224427179-1328285590.png" class="lazyload"></p>
<p><img alt="image" loading="lazy" data-src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1289798/202508/1289798-20250823224754819-1472937404.png" class="lazyload"></p>
<p><strong>桌面菜单配置参数</strong></p>
<div class="cnblogs_code">
<pre><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">/*</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">*
 * ====== 桌面os菜单配置项 ======
 * label 图标标题
 * imgico 图标(本地或网络图片) 当type: 'icon'则为uni-icons图标名，当type: 'widget'则为自定义小部件标识名
 * type 图标类型(icon | widget) icon为uni-icons图标、widget为自定义小部件
 * path 跳转路由页面
 * link 跳转外部链接
 * hideLabel 是否隐藏图标标题
 * background 自定义图标背景色
 * color 自定义图标颜色
 * padding 内边距
 * size 栅格磁贴布局(16种) 1x1 1x2 1x3 1x4、2x1 2x2 2x3 2x4、3x1 3x2 3x3 3x4、4x1 4x2 4x3 4x4
 * onClick 点击图标回调函数
 * children 二级菜单
 * </span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">*/</span></pre>
</div>
<p><img alt="image" loading="lazy" data-src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1289798/202508/1289798-20250823225306794-1906124278.png" class="lazyload"></p>
<p><span style="font-size: 12px">配置children，则显示二级缩略菜单。</span></p>
<p><img alt="image" loading="lazy" data-src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1289798/202508/1289798-20250823225514760-86072224.png" class="lazyload"></p>
<p><span style="font-size: 12px">以弹窗形式展开，背景虚化模糊效果。</span></p>
<p><img alt="image" loading="lazy" data-src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1289798/202508/1289798-20250823225612251-1402652843.png" class="lazyload"></p>
<div class="cnblogs_code">
<pre><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&lt;</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">template</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&gt;</span>
    <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&lt;</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">swiper
        </span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)">class</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="uv3__deskmenu"</span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)">
        :indicator-dots</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="true"</span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)">
        indicator-color</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="rgba(255,255,255,.5)"</span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)">
        indicator-active-color</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="#fff"</span>
    <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&gt;</span>
        <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&lt;</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">swiper-item </span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)">v-for</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="(mitem, mindex) in deskMenu"</span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)"> :key</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="mindex"</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&gt;</span>
            <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&lt;</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">view </span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)">class</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="uv3__gridwrap"</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&gt;</span>
                <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&lt;</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">view </span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)">v-for</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="(item, index) in mitem.list"</span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)"> :key</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="index"</span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)"> class</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="uv3__gridwrap-item"</span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)"> @click</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="handleClickDeskMenu(item)"</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&gt;</span>
                    <span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">&lt;!--</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)"> 图标 </span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">--&gt;</span>
                    <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&lt;</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">view </span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)">class</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="ico"</span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)"> :style</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="{'background': item.background}"</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&gt;</span>
                        <span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">&lt;!--</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)"> 二级菜单 </span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">--&gt;</span>
                        <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&lt;</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">template </span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)">v-if</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="Array.isArray(item.children)"</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&gt;</span>
                            <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&lt;</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">view </span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)">class</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="uv3__gridwrap-thumb"</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&gt;</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">
                                ...
                            </span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&lt;/</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">view</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&gt;</span>
                        <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&lt;/</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">template</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&gt;</span>
                        <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&lt;</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">template </span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)">v-else</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&gt;</span>
                            <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&lt;</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">template </span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)">v-if</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="item.type == 'widget'"</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&gt;</span>
                                <span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">&lt;!--</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)"> 自定义部件 </span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">--&gt;</span>
                                <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&lt;</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">component </span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)">:is</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="item.imgico"</span> <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">/&gt;</span>
                            <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&lt;/</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">template</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&gt;</span>
                            <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&lt;</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">template </span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)">v-else</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&gt;</span>
                                <span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">&lt;!--</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)"> 自定义图标 </span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">--&gt;</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">
                                ...
                            </span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&lt;/</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">template</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&gt;</span>
                        <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&lt;/</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">template</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&gt;</span>
                    <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&lt;/</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">view</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&gt;</span>
                    <span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">&lt;!--</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)"> 标签 </span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">--&gt;</span>
                    <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&lt;</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">view </span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)">v-if</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="!item.hideLabel"</span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)"> class</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="label clamp2"</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&gt;</span>{{item.label}}<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&lt;/</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">view</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&gt;</span>
                <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&lt;/</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">view</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&gt;</span>
            <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&lt;/</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">view</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&gt;</span>
        <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&lt;/</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">swiper-item</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&gt;</span>
    <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&lt;/</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">swiper</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&gt;</span>
    
    <span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">&lt;!--</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)"> 桌面二级菜单 </span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">--&gt;</span>
    <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&lt;</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">Popup </span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)">v-model</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="deskPopupVisible"</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&gt;</span>
        <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&lt;</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">view </span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)">class</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="uv3__deskpopup"</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&gt;</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">
            ...
        </span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&lt;/</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">view</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&gt;</span>
    <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&lt;/</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">Popup</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&gt;</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">

    ...
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&lt;/</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">template</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&gt;</span></pre>
</div>
<p><span style="font-size: 12px">点击桌面图标，支持以如下几种方式绑定事件。</span></p>
<div class="cnblogs_code">
<pre>const handleClickDeskMenu = (item) =&gt;<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)"> {
    </span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">if</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">(item.link) {
        </span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">//</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)"> 链接</span>
<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">        openURL(item.link)
    }</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">else</span> <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">if</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">(item.path) {
        </span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">//</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)"> 页面路由地址</span>
<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">        uni.navigateTo({
            url: item.path.substr(</span>0, 1) == '/' ? item.path : '/' +<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)"> item.path
        })
    }</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">else</span> <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">if</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">(Array.isArray(item.children)) {
        </span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">//</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)"> 二级菜单</span>
        deskPopupMenu.value =<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)"> item
        deskPopupVisible.value </span>= <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">true</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">
    }
    </span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">//</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)"> 绑定点击事件</span>
    <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">typeof</span> item.onClick === 'function' &amp;&amp;<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)"> item.onClick()
}</span></pre>
</div>
<p><strong><span style="font-size: 12px">桌面菜单json配置片段</span></strong></p>
<div class="cnblogs_code">
<pre>const deskMenu =<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)"> ref([
  {
    pid: </span>202508182307<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">,
    list: [
      {label: </span>'今日', imgico: 'today', type: 'widget', hideLabel: <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">true</span>, size: '2x1'<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">},
      {label: </span>'备忘录', imgico: 'note', type: 'widget', size: '2x2'<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">},
      {label: </span>'倒计时', imgico: 'countdown', type: 'widget', hideLabel: <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">true</span>, size: '3x2'<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">},

      ...
    ]
  },
  {
    pid: </span>202508182310<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">,
    list: [
      {label: </span>'Appstore', imgico: '/static/os/AppStore.png'<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">},
      
      ...
    ]
  },
  {
    pid: </span>202508182315<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">,

      ...

  },
  {
    pid: </span>202508182319<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">,

      {label: </span>'DeepSeek', imgico: 'https://cdn.deepseek.com/logo.png', link: 'https://chat.deepseek.com/', hideLabel: <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">true</span>, background: '#fff', padding: '10px', size: '3x2'<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">},
      
      ...
    ]
  },
  {
    pid: </span>202508182321<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">,

        ]
      },
      {
        label: </span>'个人中心'<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">,

      },
      {
        label: </span>'AI应用'<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">,
        </span>'children'<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">: [
          {label: </span>'DeepSeek', imgico: 'https://www.faxianai.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/02/20250205134524-1febd.png', link: 'https://chat.deepseek.com/', background: '#fff', padding: '5px'<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">,},
          {label: </span>'腾讯元宝', imgico: 'https://www.faxianai.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/02/20250224143149-7fe1f.png', link: 'https://yuanbao.tencent.com/', padding: '5px'<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">},
          {label: </span>'豆包', imgico: 'https://lf-flow-web-cdn.doubao.com/obj/flow-doubao/doubao/web/static/image/OnboardingAvatar.0f4f29a4.webp', link: 'https://www.doubao.com/'<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">,},

<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">        }
      },
      {
        label: </span>'公众号', imgico: 'weixin', type: 'icon'<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">,
        onClick: () </span>=&gt;<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)"> {
          </span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">//</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)"> ...</span>
<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">        }
      },
    ]
  }
])</span></pre>
</div>
<p>以上就是uniapp+vue3实战仿ios手机oa管理系统的一些知识分享，感谢大家的阅读与支持~</p>
